name: Highschool Glamorous Girl
description:
Back to school is always so much fun for you because it means you’ll get a chance to see all your friends and show off your awesome style sense.

That means it’s time to find your new style using the hottest fashion trends. The beauty salon is where you need to be! You’ll be able to change up your look with a makeover featuring the best fashion trends for makeup and clothing.

Product Features:
- Dress the girls in cute clothes.
- Pick out the perfect makeup.
- Have a photoshoot for their celebrity band posters!

As usual, you can enjoy the fun of makeover, dressing-up as well as doing spa for the four pretty girls. Guess what! In this bran-new game you can even chat with the girls’ schoolmates or date them.

Ah, completing the daily tasks will offer you large amounts of rewards! So you won’t worry about the decorations for your girl’s friends any more!
